name: Lunchtime Louts Sprint 1
description:
Submit feedback at https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeDJzHnan1VI3Xs4q_mKHJp0xbdFjSqnFSbUcKT...

Lunchtime Louts is a single-player 2-dimensional top-down game. You play as a teacher, and it's your job to enforce school rules and discipline students. 

All of my files were corrupted a day before submitting this, so the final game will be completely different to this.
